哥沢: (うたざわ) - (歌沢 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen) slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
哥沢節: (うたざわぶし) - (歌沢節 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢節 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen)  slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
哥老会: (かろうかい) - Gelaohui (secret Chinese society of the late Xing dynasty)
哨吶草: (チャルメルそう) - Mitella stylosa (species of miterwort)
哨戒: (しょうかい) - patrolling (esp. using ships or aircraft)
哨戒艦艇: (しょうかいかんてい) - military patrol boat
哭く: (なく) - to cry; to weep; to sob; to howl
哮り立つ: (たけりたつ) - (esp. 猛り立つ) to rage; (esp. 哮り立つ) to howl
哲: (tetsu) - filosofia, sábio, homem sábio, filósofo, discípulo; sagacidade, sabedoria, inteligência
哲学博士: (てつがくはかせ) - doctor of philosophy; PhD
哲学的人間学: (てつがくてきにんげんがく) - philosophical anthropology
哲学者の石: (てつがくしゃのいし) - philosopher's stone
哺乳類型爬虫類: (ほにゅうるいがたはちゅうるい) - mammal-like reptile
哺育: (ほいく) - nursing; nurturing; rearing; lactation; suckling
唄う: (うたう) - to sing; (esp. 歌う, 詠う) to sing (one's praises in a poem, etc.)/to compose a poem/to recite a poem
唄方: (うたかた) - singer in a nagauta performance
唄物: (うたもの) - an utai (noh chant) piece for recitation; accompanied singing in which the singing is emphasized over the instrumental part (emphasised)
唆す: (そそのかす) - to instigate; to tempt
唆る: (そそる) - to excite; to incite; to stimulate; to arouse; to tempt; to stir up
唎き酒: (ききざけ) - sake tasting; wine tasting
唎酒: (ききざけ) - sake tasting; wine tasting
唐の昔: (とうのむかし) - a long time ago
唐の芋: (とうのいも) - var. of taro with long purple stalks
唐三盆: (とうさんぼん) - high-quality sugar imported from China
唐人: (からびと) - Chinese person; Korean person
唐人稗: (トウジンビエ) - pearl millet (Pennisetum glaucum)
唐名: (からな) - Chinese name for a high government office (ritsuryo period); (からな only)  alias/pseudonym
唐土: (とうど) - China; (もろこし only) Chinese
唐天竺: (からてんじく) - China and India; far away
唐子: (からこ) - boy or doll dressed in ancient Chinese clothes
唐宋音: (とうそうおん) - T'ang reading of Chinese characters
唐当帰: (カラトウキ) - dong quai (aromatic herb used to treat various gynecological symptoms, Angelica sinensis)
唐手: (からて) - karate; (空手 only) empty handed
唐揚: (カラアゲ) - fried food (most oft. chicken)
唐揚げ: (カラアゲ) - fried food (most oft. chicken)
唐撫子: (カラナデシコ) - China pink (species of flower, Dianthus chinensis)
唐木: (からき) - exotic non-Japanese wood (rosewood, ebony, blackwood, etc.); imported wood
唐木瓜: (カラボケ) - kara flowering quince; Choenomeles lagenaria
唐机: (とうづくえ) - desk made in China; Chinese style desk
唐松: (カラマツ) - (Japanese) larch (Larix leptolepis, Larix kaempferi)
唐果物: (からくだもの) - deep-fried Chinese pastry (sweetened with jiaogulan)
唐桃: (カラモモ) - apricot (Prunus armeniaca); Prunus persica var. densa (Chinese variety of peach)
唐梅: (トウバイ) - wintersweet (Chimonanthus praecox); Japanese allspice
唐棕梠: (トウジュロ) - miniature Chusan palm (Trachycarpus wagnerianus); (poss. Trachycarpus fortunei)
唐棕櫚: (トウジュロ) - miniature Chusan palm (Trachycarpus wagnerianus); (poss. Trachycarpus fortunei)
唐楓: (トウカエデ) - trident maple; acer buergerianum
唐楽: (とうがく) - Tang-era Chinese music; style of gagaku based on Tang-era Chinese music and ancient Indian song and dance
唐様: (からよう) - Chinese design/Chinese style; traditional architecture associated with Zen
唐檜: (トウヒ) - spruce tree (esp. Picea jezoensis hondoensis, a variety of Ezo spruce)
唐津焼き: (からつやき) - Karatsu ware; Karatsu porcelain
唐物: (とうもつ) - Chinese goods/imported goods; (からもの only)  secondhand goods/old furniture
唐犬: (からいぬ) - foreign dog (esp. of Chinese origin)
